testcase.name: Login to application validate User Email

testcase.name: Login to application validate User Email 2
testcase.system-out: Given Login application present.............................................passed When enter valid username "Ashok135"........................................passed And enter valid password "Manipallearning@2021".............................passed And click on Login validButton..............................................passed Then I should see email as "ashok135246@gmail.com"..........................passed And click on Inbox..........................................................passed And click on Compose Message................................................passed And enter value for Send to as "abc1234567".................................passed And enter Subject as "Hi For Testing".......................................passed And enter Message as "Hello Admin, This is for testing. From, Ashok".....passed And click on send button....................................................passed Then I should see acknowledgement as "The message has been sent to abc def (abc1234567)".passed Then close the driver.......................................................passed
